"""
I see the connection is failing due to path finding issues. Let's try a different approach
using smaller, more controlled belt placements with place_entity_next_to().
"""

# First ensure we have materials
move_to(nearest(Resource.IronOre))
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.IronOre), quantity=50)

# Move to furnaces and insert ore and fuel
move_to(furnace1.position)
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace1, quantity=25)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace1, quantity=10)

# Wait for smelting
sleep(10)

# Collect the iron plates
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace1.position, quantity=25)

# Craft all required items
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=10)
craft_item(Prototype.TransportBelt, quantity=30)

# Start from the drill's drop position
current_pos = drill.drop_position
print(f"Starting belt placement from drill position: {current_pos}")

# Place first belt under the drill
move_to(current_pos)
current_belt = place_entity_next_to(
    Prototype.TransportBelt,
    reference_position=current_pos,
    direction=Direction.DOWN,
    spacing=1
)
assert current_belt, "Failed to place first belt"

# Build a few belts downward
for i in range(3):
    move_to(current_belt.position)
    next_belt = place_entity_next_to(
        Prototype.TransportBelt,
        reference_position=current_belt.position,
        direction=Direction.DOWN,
        spacing=1
    )
    assert next_belt, "Failed to place vertical belt"
    current_belt = next_belt
    print(f"Placed vertical belt at: {current_belt.position}")

# Now build towards the furnace (right)
for i in range(5):
    move_to(current_belt.position)
    next_belt = place_entity_next_to(
        Prototype.TransportBelt,
        reference_position=current_belt.position,
        direction=Direction.RIGHT,
        spacing=1
    )
    assert next_belt, "Failed to place horizontal belt"
    current_belt = next_belt
    print(f"Placed horizontal belt at: {current_belt.position}")

# Final approach to furnace
while current_belt.position.x < furnace1.position.x - 1:
    move_to(current_belt.position)
    next_belt = place_entity_next_to(
        Prototype.TransportBelt,
        reference_position=current_belt.position,
        direction=Direction.RIGHT,
        spacing=1
    )
    assert next_belt, "Failed to place final approach belt"
    current_belt = next_belt
    print(f"Placed final approach belt at: {current_belt.position}")

# Add fuel to the drill
move_to(drill.position)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=5)

print(f"Automated mining line setup completed. Current entities: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Wait a bit to see if the system is working
sleep(10)
print("Checking if automation is working...")
print(f"Furnace contents: {inspect_inventory(furnace1)}")
